title: Dominion Issues
body:
NO ONE KNOWS HOW TO PLAY THIS FUCKING GAME MODE!

Players getting 0/0 on the towers doing nothing but go for kills.

That is THE main issue with this game, the number 1 issue that is and will forever be stuck in this game until Riot changes how the game works.

You MUST change how the game works and allow a personal scoring system to be implemented and put kill and assists on a low score vs what actually matters, _**objectives**_. You need to give players an actual reason to go for objectives, especially when you play a fun game mode that means absolutely nothing other than keeping someone like myself on a positive win percentage on this map. They come here for fun, the same they do on TT, and all they do is run around and get kills.

Players will take this same mentality into Ranked and just go for kills, I see it all the time. You need more of a reward when players take objectives to give them the precedent they deserve over getting a mass amount of kills.

FFS, you CAN'T WIN ANY GAME MODE WITHOUT GETTING THE DAMNED OBJECTIVES... OK, maybe you can if the minions do enough of your work on the objectives. But against smart opponents, players who know what it takes to win, if you continually ignore the objectives, the minions won't be able to get them in time before the enemy gets strong enough to match it with you and win.

Now I am not here complaining about the rotating game mode, The Crystal Scar was removed for a reason, for this exact reason, players would join teams who knew exactly what to do and how to win, you capture 3 towers and sit under them. The towers help with the damage and if you control 3, your opponents nexus health will just drop until you win.

Boring as fuck and not a good look for the game, but one that almost guarantees a win in each and every queue you join. Now that this new Dominion has no access between the 2 towers that cannot be captured, all you need to do is hold 2 towers and you win. This weekend is going to piss off a lot of players.
